addr: 2025 North San Fernando Road Los Angeles, CA 90065
title: Mac & Cheese Smackdown presented by Time Out Los Angeles
desc: Taste your way through the best mac & cheese LA has to offer at Time Out Los Angeles' inaugural Mac & Cheese Smackdown on Sunday, December 6 at LA River Studios. Time Out Los Angeles?editors have challenged some of the city?s best restaurants to offer creative takes on this cheesy classic in the ultimate showdown to crown LA?s top mac. When purchasing tickets,?you can choose from two sessions (Noon-2pm and 2:30-4:30pm).  Your ticket includes mac & cheese tastings from each featured restaurant paired with complimentary beer provided by Angel City Brewery and wine provided by Dark Horse! ?A portion of the proceeds from the event will benefit  Best Friends Animal Society , so come out and support a good cause at this Sunday Funday your arteries won?t forget. #macsmack This year?s featured contenders for best mac & cheese include:?
